languages.text: "По крайней мере он попытался обратиться к тому, кого считал другом, а не вышиб ему мозги при встрече. Хотя кому я это говорю?"
"At least he tried to get through to his friend instead of just blowing his brains out on sight. Oh wait, I forgot who I'm talking to."
languages.original_text: "По крайней мере он попытался обратиться к тому, кого считал другом, а не вышиб ему мозги при встрече. Хотя кому я это говорю?"

traits.locale_text: "At least he tried to get through to his friend instead of just blowing his brains out on sight. Oh wait, I forgot who I'm talking to."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "At least he tried to get through to his friend instead of just blowing his brains out on sight. Oh wait, I forgot who I'm talking to."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "At least he tried to get through to his friend instead of just blowing his brains out on sight. Oh wait, I forgot who I'm talking to."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “至少他尝试过，先和他的朋友沟通，而不是一见面就开枪打爆他的脑袋。噢，等等，我忘了我面前的这个人是谁了。”
languages.original_text: "At least he tried to get through to his friend instead of just blowing his brains out on sight. Oh wait, I forgot who I'm talking to."

traits.locale_text: “至少他尝试过，先和他的朋友沟通，而不是一见面就开枪打爆他的脑袋。噢，等等，我忘了我面前的这个人是谁了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Au moins, il a essayé de raisonner son ami au lieu de lui exploser la cervelle sans réfléchir. Oh, pardon, j'avais oublié à qui je parlais. »
languages.original_text: "At least he tried to get through to his friend instead of just blowing his brains out on sight. Oh wait, I forgot who I'm talking to."

traits.locale_text: « Au moins, il a essayé de raisonner son ami au lieu de lui exploser la cervelle sans réfléchir. Oh, pardon, j'avais oublié à qui je parlais. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Zumindest hat er versucht, zu seinem Freund durchzudringen, statt ihm einfach sofort das Gehirn wegzupusten. Ach, Augenblick, ich habe ganz vergessen, mit wem ich spreche."
languages.original_text: "At least he tried to get through to his friend instead of just blowing his brains out on sight. Oh wait, I forgot who I'm talking to."

traits.locale_text: "Zumindest hat er versucht, zu seinem Freund durchzudringen, statt ihm einfach sofort das Gehirn wegzupusten. Ach, Augenblick, ich habe ganz vergessen, mit wem ich spreche."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「少なくとも彼は自分の友達の脳みそをふっ飛ばすことなく、理解しようとしたわ。あぁ待って、私今誰と話してるのかしら」
languages.original_text: "At least he tried to get through to his friend instead of just blowing his brains out on sight. Oh wait, I forgot who I'm talking to."

traits.locale_text: 「少なくとも彼は自分の友達の脳みそをふっ飛ばすことなく、理解しようとしたわ。あぁ待って、私今誰と話してるのかしら」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Por lo menos intentó hacer que su amigo entrara en razón en vez de volarle la sesera a la primera de cambio. Ah, que se me olvidaba con quién hablo».
languages.original_text: "At least he tried to get through to his friend instead of just blowing his brains out on sight. Oh wait, I forgot who I'm talking to."

traits.locale_text: «Por lo menos intentó hacer que su amigo entrara en razón en vez de volarle la sesera a la primera de cambio. Ah, que se me olvidaba con quién hablo».

languages.original_text: "At least he tried to get through to his friend instead of just blowing his brains out on sight. Oh wait, I forgot who I'm talking to."

languages.text: "Arkadaşını görür görmez kafasını uçurmaktansa ona ulaşmayı denediğine şükredelim. Ben kime laf anlatıyorum..."
languages.original_text: "At least he tried to get through to his friend instead of just blowing his brains out on sight. Oh wait, I forgot who I'm talking to."
